  1. controller

Uses of Package
controller

Packages that use controller
Package
Description
controller
 
view
 
  • Classes in controller used by controller
    Class
    Description
    AssetLoader
    Manages all game assets, such as images and animations.
    AudioManager
    Manages all audio playback for the game, including sound effects (SFX) and music.
    GameoverHandler
    Handles user input and logic for the Game Over screen.
    InputHandler
    Centralized input manager for handling all keyboard and mouse events.
    LeaderboardHandler
    Handles the logic for the leaderboard screen.
    MainMenuHandler
    Handles user input and logic for the main menu screen.
    PausedHandler
    Handles user input and logic for the pause menu.
    PopupHandler
    Manages the state and logic for in-game popups, such as search progress bars and notifications.
    ProfileSelectionHandler
    Handles user input and logic for the profile selection screen.
    StatsHandler
    Handles user input for the statistics screen.
    TerminalHandler
    Handles user input and logic for the in-game terminal screen.
    VictoryHandler
    Handles user input and logic for the Victory screen.
